import React from 'react' import { verifyPassword } from '../backend/fetchData' interface LoginProps { setShowLogin: React.Dispatch> setUsername: React.Dispatch> setProfileDropdown: React.Dispatch> } function Login({ setShowLogin, setUsername, setProfileDropdown }: LoginProps) { const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() const form = e.currentTarget as HTMLFormElement const username = form.elements.namedItem('username') as HTMLInputElement const password = form.elements.namedItem('password') as HTMLInputElement await console.log(verifyPassword(username.value, password.value)) setUsername(username.value) setProfileDropdown(false) setShowLogin(false) } return (

Login

handleSubmit(e)}>
) } export default Login
